subject: Mathematics
question_text: What is the freezing point depression constant of a solvent, 50 g of which contain 1 g non volatile solute (molar mass ) and the decrease in freezing point is 0.40 K ? 2025 (28 Jan Shift 1) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo Mn 2+ 3+ Ni 2+ Ti 3+ 2 NaHCO 3 256 g mol −1 3.72 K kg mol −1 1.86 K kg mol −1 4.43 K kg mol −1 5.12 K kg mol −1
